resources.string:
BODY WASHING
One stop/start shower = 5 l
One stop/start with hair wash = 10 l
2-minute-shower = 20 l
One waskom or sponge bath (basin) = 3 l

TOILET
One normal flush= 9l
One half flush = 4.5l
Greywater flush (from shower, rainwater etc) = 0l

HYGIENE
One hands wash = 0.3l
One face wash = 0.5l
Hands wash with hand sanitiser = 0l

BRUSHING TEETH
Brushing teeth =0.15l

LAUNDRY
Washing maching load (70l) = 10 l per day
Hand washing load per day = 9l

DISHES
1 dishwasher load (24 l) = approximately 3.5 l per day
1 sink wash a day = 9 l

DRINKING
Water, tea, coffee = 3 l

COOKING
Washing fruit and veg and to cook = 2 l

CLEANING
House clean = 8 l

PETS
Small size pet = 0,5 l
Medium size pet = 1 l
Large size pet = 2 l
Dogs: 50 –70 ml per kg.
Cats: 20 – 40 ml per kg.
